required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study on Anticholinergic Use: Attribution of Overactive Bladder (OAB) Medications to the Anticholinergic Burden
clinical_study.official_title: A Retrospective Database Analysis of Anticholinergic Burden Among the Elderly With and Without Overactive Bladder in Australia and South Korea

brief_summary.textblock: Outpatients with at least one dispensing record of any medication will be included in the study. An index date will be assigned to each participant and prescription records for anticholinergics will be used in the study.

primary_outcome.description: ACB will be calculated based on methodology from Campbell et al (2016). Sum (Drug A #days prescribed X ACB scale score) + (Drug B #days prescribed X ACB scale score) + (Drug Xâ€¦)/Number of days with any medication prescribed. The cumulative score has a range from 0 to infinity, with higher values indicating a higher cumulative anticholinergic burden of the patient.

secondary_outcome.measure: Median percentage of ACB score derived from overactive bladder (OAB) treatment(s) in total ACB score
secondary_outcome.description: The attribution of antimuscarinics for OAB treatment to entire anticholinergic exposures in OAB patients.

arm_group.description: Subjects who have dispensing records for treatment of overactive bladder will be included
Subjects who do not have dispensing records for treatment of overactive bladder will be included

intervention.description: Overview of anticholinergic burden, rather than to evaluate specific drugs

study_pop.textblock: Australian and Korean with at least one prescription of any treatment between January 22, 2016 and December 31, 2016 derived from country claims data.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have at least one dispensing of any medication between January 22, 2016 and December 31, 2016.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants who do not have a complete year of data availability in the database prior to index date.
- Have record of hospitalization on the index date.

patient_data.ipd_description: Access to anonymized individual participant level data will not be provided for this trial as it meets one or more of the exceptions described on www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com under "Sponsor Specific Details for Astellas.
